column5: My Polaris 500ho says its in 4x4 but it's only in 2x4.  Any recommendations for a repair shop close to Milton?  Any ideas what could be wrong or how much I'm in for?  Thanks  Steve
Electric shift or manual. Electric should be a easy to diagnois!
Sorry, only my second year owning a ATV. The switch from 2x4 to 4x4 is a electric switch.  I found a Polaris dealer in Burlington. Hope its a cheap fix
